var _strOut = ' '; var _strSysId = "${RP.getWindowProperties().get('sysparm_sys_id')}"; var _grSensor = new GlideRecord('u_sensor'); if (!GlideStringUtil.isEligibleSysID(_strSysId)) { _strOut = 'That page was invoked with an invalid Sys ID!'; } else if (!_grSensor.get(_strSysId)) { _strOut = 'A Sensor with Sys ID = "' + _strSysId + '" could not be found!'; } else if (!_grSensor.canRead()) { _strOut = 'You are not allowed to access Sensor "' + _grSensor.name + '"!'; } else { GlideController.putGlobal('is_sensor_simulation', 'true'); var _strOut = 'Due to technical issues no signal content could be created!'; var _objSignal = global.HealthSentinelUtils.executeScriptInScope( _grSensor.getValue('sys_scope'), 'var current = param1;' + 'result = ' + _grSensor.getValue('script'), _grSensor ); if (_objSignal !== null) { _strOut = _objSignal.toString(); } } 
${_strOut}
